attributes.action: Give Taxpayers a defined choice on where their money is spent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Im happy to pay tax for the NHS,transport and event the olympics, but I dont want my money to pay for immigrants, benefit cheats or day centres for gay and lesbian pets, or to build mosques for the newly arrived immigrants to plot the downfall of the country that took them in.
